name: NuunFlavorFinder
0:
”Alexa, open nuun flavor finder”
”Alexa, start nuun flavor finder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nuun flavor finder
des: Alexa helps you choose what flavor of Nuun to drink. Simply say “Alexa, open Nuun Flavor Finder” and Alexa will ask you what type of Nuun is right to quench your thirst. From the seven categories of Nuun, Alexa will then select a flavor just for you to enjoy. Don’t love her first choice? She’ll pick another one for you, if you ask nicely.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
